title: News24.com | SA unlikely to avoid 'wildfire' spread of Covid-19, but lockdown bought time - top scientist
description: The country must brace for a significant spike in coronavirus cases when lockdown is lifted, a top scientist warns at a briefing by experts leading government's response to Covid-19.
content:
South Africa will likely not be able to prevent the exponential spread of Covid-19, with the full sweep of the disease to probably hit the country later this year.
And although South Africa acted much earlier than other nations in identifying the virus and i… [+6920 chars]
